.. _changelog:

Changelog
=========

0.3.1 (2015-03-24)
------------------

Client now handles SIGTERM


0.3 (2015-03-18)
------------------

Added tests to bring total coverage to 100%


0.2 (2015-03-11)
------------------

Improved survivability.

Improved traceback logging.

Added backoff to Component.

Sphinx-ed and added to readthedocs.org


0.1 (2014-10-11)
------------------

Initial release.
